ItemDescription.SourceString: Charging this weapon causes the laser to split and chain to multiple targets on hitting. Longer charge times increase the number of splits, up to a max of 3. Charged shots generate more heat and consume more ammo.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Charging this weapon causes the laser to split and chain to multiple targets on hitting. Longer charge times increase the number of splits, up to a max of 3. Charged shots generate more heat and consume more ammo.
